name: Abraham Perez
introText: I’m specializing on web and mobile Front-End or Full Stack development. I'm currently looking for a remote job opportunity as Front-end or Full-stack developer!
aboutMeText: Hello! My name is Abraham and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2018 when I was exposed to basic concepts of Web Development such as jQuery, HTML, and CSS on my Internet Programming class. I was amazed to know that I can create any interface only using a computer!

Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of having two internships at ExxonMobil, one as an Admin Analyst and the other one as Full Stack intern. My main focus these days is develop and support the international market distribution centers with web applications that help them improve their supply chain opperation's efficiency.
I also recently launched this personal portfolio that I made from scratch using HTML, SASS, Vanilla JS, and Eleventy.
Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
